The color receives positive feedback, and while some it's not see-through at all, others find it see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5â€™6 25 Weeks Pregnant Size L Very Comfortable Dress!
items.body: This dress is beautiful but I ended up going a different option for my baby shower in December. Iâ€™m 5â€™6 and I ordered a L in this dress. Itâ€™s very comfortable however fit me slightly on the bigger size. If I were to choose this dress for my baby shower I wouldâ€™ve kept this Large size since Iâ€™m mostly going to get bigger lol! But if I needed it for right now I would exchange for a Medium. The color is beautiful and the fabric is nice and thick. Not see through at all. Even though Iâ€™m returning it I would still recommend this dress! Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE â¤ï¸
items.body: I was looking for a nice evening gown that would be warm enough for the Arizona winter when I went to see the local Nutcracker. My sister was wearing a heavy shrug with her dress, but this sweater dress was warm enough that I did not need it. I took these photos after wearing it for hours, so it had begun to sag a little bit because of the knit fabric. So the photos really do not do this dress full justice. But it was so flattering to my hourglass figure! It was just the right length for me (@ 5'4"), and it was very soft and comfortable. The knit fabric is very thick. It was thick enough that I could wear no bra under it without worrying about looking risquÃ©. But it is tight enough to be flattering. For reference, I bought a Medium; and I am 5'4", 140 lbs. Read more
items.author: Eden Bar

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Rose Red, Dark Cyan, Wine Red, Khaki, White, Apricot, Royal Blue, Army Green, Black, Light Pink, Dark Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
